Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 8/24/2020...
Injured on 9/4/2020 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/2021, hitting .407 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Traded from San Diego to Los Angeles (A) on 2/1/2023 (Going to SD: P Aaron Nola. Going to LAA: 3B Jedd Gyorko)...
